post:
Hello, At [Beta VPS](www.betavps.net) we have over 10 years experience with web hosting and servers. We provide 99.9% uptime and real support. Our VPS's are cheap, Port limited for quiet neighbors on the node.

We at Dos Servers (Beta VPS part of Dos Servers) aren't so new in hosting industry, **We operating from 2010** with servers in Canada, USA, Germany and France. We never posted here as we were limiting the countries that people was able to order (Limitation by ip ban so some countries didnt even saw the website as live)
We changed this and opened option to every one in the world to order. ( We still reject high risk orders from high risk countries)


Overview of all Packages here: [www.BetaVPS.net](www.betavps.net)

**Minimum Server Specifications:**

Intel Xeon E3 - 1230
16GB DDRIII 1333 RAM
2x 1TB SATAIII Harddisk RAID 1
Network Port: 100Mbps

**Every VPS has port limit you can use the full speed all the time 24/7 as it Unmetered Bandwidth**
